description: Error inflating XML layout file. Indicates malformed XML, missing resources, or incorrect view attributes.
commonCauses: Custom view class not found or wrong package
solutions: Check XML syntax and attribute names carefully
Verify all resource references exist (@drawable, @string, etc.)
Ensure custom view classes are accessible
Use fully qualified names for custom views
Add ProGuard keep rules for custom views
Check for circular view references in includes
Validate XML with lint before building
prevention: Use Android Studio's layout preview to catch errors early
Enable strict XML validation in IDE
Test layouts on multiple API levels
Keep ProGuard rules for all custom views
Use ViewBinding to avoid runtime inflation errors
Use merge tags and includes carefully
examples: val binding = ActivityMainBinding.inflate(layoutInflater) // ViewBinding prevents many inflate errors
